sections.title: What is Cr√©dit Agricole and how does the bonus work
content: Cr√©dit Agricole is a European bank offering an online account with an Italian IBAN, fully manageable via app.
By opening an account and using a debit card, you can receive a ‚Ç¨50 Amazon voucher with a simple purchase of at least ‚Ç¨0.10.
Additionally, you can get another ‚Ç¨50 if you deposit your salary or pension for at least one month, and up to ‚Ç¨50 extra as cashback when spending with the card.
Each completed referral gives you another ‚Ç¨50 in Amazon vouchers, up to a maximum of 4 invites (total ‚Ç¨200).

sections.title: Main requirements
content: Minimum transaction required: at least ‚Ç¨0.10 within 60 days of opening (and in any case by 08/10/2025).
To get the salary bonus, you must receive a regular deposit (salary or pension) by August 10, 2025, and maintain it until that date.
To receive up to ‚Ç¨50 cashback, you must make card purchases within the first 60 days:
üíµ ‚Ç¨25 if you spend at least ‚Ç¨500; üíµ ‚Ç¨50 if you exceed ‚Ç¨1,000.
The account is free for the first 9 months, then ‚Ç¨2/month if you are over 35 (free for under 35).
The VISA card is free for 24 months. The Bancomat Easy Cash card is also available for in-person payments only.
Valid documents (ID and health card) and a short video selfie are required for identification.
The bonus is issued within 120 days of the promotion's end.
Only those aged 18 or older can register.
Maximum 4 invites per user; the counter resets with each new promotion.

sections.title: Step-by-step guide
content: 1. Register from the link at the top of the page: make sure the promotional code is correctly entered and click 'Use promo code'.
2. Choose the nearest branch (random if none nearby). If in doubt, they will contact you by phone or email.
3. Enter your data, fill out the anti-money laundering section, and confirm your address and tax code. Choose the VISA DEBIT card.
4. Verify documents: you will need to photograph your ID and health card, as well as record a short video with a code.
5. Sign the documents digitally and wait for confirmation emails. You will need to complete the signature with an OTP code received via SMS.
6. After about 24 hours, you will receive account activation. Set up login credentials from the Cr√©dit Agricole customer site.
7. After another 24-48 hours, you can activate the virtual card from the app: go to the 'Cards and accounts' menu, then enable online payments.
8. Once the card is active, deposit at least ‚Ç¨0.10 with an instant transfer and complete an eligible transaction (POS, online, or wallet).
üí° Ideas for the purchase: Revolut recharge with payment link, TikTok token purchase, apps for a few cents on App Store or Google Play.
‚ùå Not valid: transfers, SIM recharges, or prepaid card top-ups. Avoid purchases under ‚Ç¨5, unless it's an Amazon recharge.
9. The Amazon voucher is sent within 120 days of verifying the requirements (08/10/2025).
üíµ To get the extra bonuses:
- Make purchases of at least ‚Ç¨500 (‚Ç¨25) or ‚Ç¨1,000 (‚Ç¨50) within 60 days.
- Deposit your salary or pension by 08/10/2025 and keep it active to receive another ‚Ç¨50.
‚úÖ All bonuses are cumulative.
